ygData.msgSnippet: rotfl!!! hello guys. most know me as Queen. i play on the Bristlebane server and have my own guild. 68 shaman [main] queenaquarius 53 monk [2nd love]
ygData.messageBody:
rotfl!!!

hello guys. most know me as Queen.
i play on the Bristlebane server and have my own guild.

68 shaman [main] queenaquarius
53 monk [2nd love] queenlibra
46 necromancer queenaries
40 magician [bazaar trader] queenvirgo
35 bard queenleo
35 beastlord queengemini
34 enchanter queentaurean
11 Paladin [just destroyed my wiz last night to make her so she can be
marked as my current adoration =P] queenscorpio

--- Steven Hulse <steven.hulse@...> wrote:

> Hey Mike and welcome!
>
> there is a group or list (I haven't done much with it lately) but
> it's
> something like Everquest Meetup (http://everquest.meetup.com/ I
> believethats
> the URL)
>

>

> Druid,
> Cleric, Warrior and Beast Lord. Main's in her 50's and the others are
> 22 -
> 30.
>
> (Thinking about it, if i could log all of them on at once I'd have a
> heck of
> a group!) LOL
>
> Durgaa
